akn:subsection.akn:heading: Definitions of critical mineral and critical mineral or metal

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Definitions of critical mineral and critical mineral or metal In this section, the terms “critical mineral” and “critical mineral or metal” include any host mineral of a critical mineral (within the meaning of those terms in section 1606 of title 30).
